text:
So weâ€™re out here in the deserts of Dubai
ready to get in our buggys with Sand Trax

Doing the dunes in Dubai
Yeah!

Had a great morning out here in the
Arabian desert in Dubai

We got to go to this beautiful conservation
area

learned how the Bedouins used Falcons
also went way out into the desert

saw some Oryx and some other wildlife
even saw a Monitor Lizard

very cool
a great way to spend a morning in Dubai

Well our dune buggy adventure has come to
an end

we had a great night
we went out on the dunes

we rode the buggys
we had an adventure

and then we came back and we watched some
entertainment

we saw some belly dancing
we saw some tanoura dancing

which was spectacular
I highly recommend getting out to the desert
